Sentence: The systemic effects of pulmonary hypertension are widespread and can be severe.

Sentence: Additionally, patients may experience dizziness, fainting, and fatigue due to reduced blood flow to the body.

Sentence: Pulmonary hypertension can worsen existing conditions like coronary artery disease or diabetes, complicating treatment.

Sentence: Monitoring and managing pulmonary hypertension is crucial to prevent these systemic effects and improve quality of life.
